page_content: Information about legal internships required for the bar exam in the Canton of Zug.
Announcement about the Canton of Zug's Supreme Court publishing its decisions online using specific software.
Information on the preparedness of emergency services for the 2019 Swiss Wrestling and Alpine Festival in Zug.
Report on the arrest of a driver and passenger for multiple violations on the A4 highway.
Information and services for new residents in the Canton of Zug, including language courses and integration programs.
Various updates from the government council, including the acquisition of new planning software for Pro Senectute Kanton Zug.
Announcement about the Zuger Police's new drone technology for crime scene documentation, which includes specialized software for creating 3D models.
Report on two additional cases of COVID-19 in the Canton of Zug, along with guidelines for public events and hygiene measures.
Information on safety protocols for the start of the school year in the Canton of Zug, including quarantine rules and mask mandates.
Report on the first case of COVID-19 in the Canton of Zug, along with guidelines for people showing symptoms.
Overview of the Canton of Zug's Geoinformation Department, which operates an interactive map library and provides geospatial data through various digital platforms.
